ygData.subject: League of Misfits
ygData.msgSnippet: The Drinal Guild many have waited for. We are the League of Misfits, new souls of Drinal, breathing new life into that misfit of Norrath. A guild that
ygData.messageBody:
The Drinal Guild many have waited for. We are the
League of Misfits, "new souls" of Drinal, breathing new
life into that "misfit" of Norrath. A guild that
understands that some of us have family & jobs and need
overall "ying and yang" for the game and real life in
general. <br><br>Becoming a citizen of Norrath can be a
difficult task. There are many guilds that will insist you
pull up a chair, grab that 6-pack of Jolt cola and
toss 8 hrs away for the good of the Raid. The League
is not that guild.<br><br>The League is a guild that
understands and game is still a game, period. The League is a
guild for that "special" player that just wants to
play, kill stuff and gain exp....after you figure out
what that spell is..... Sure, we may plan a raid? But
it will be a sight uphold!<br><br>An exclusive guild
on Drinal that gives you a "second chance" to prove
your worth in the world of Norrath. We have a 100%
tolerance policy, you screw up...you try again. Its just a
game and we all understand that.<br><br>Help us help
you. The League of Misfits exists for you. Give us a
tell in game, you know who you are.....experience not
required.
